snippet.title: STRETCHER MEN time attack by the developer using a keyboard
snippet.description:
The in-game timer stops when you get a game over or open the menu.

Just like driving a car, you need to accelerate on straight paths and slow down on curves. If you try to turn at high speed, the person on the stretcher will fall off immediately. Slowing down a bit before turning will help keep the person on the stretcher.

In the forced scroll sections, you need to move through certain areas within a limited time. Speed control is crucial during these sections. Move quickly on straight paths to keep up with the camera, and slow down before making turns.

With a keyboard, you can adjust the speed continuously using the up and down arrow keys. Pressing the up arrow slightly will increase the speed a little, while holding it down will increase the speed to the maximum. The same goes for the down arrow key to slow down.

1 1:55
2 3:34
3 8:12
4 10:07
5 15:37
6 17:27
7 20:05
8 22:46
9 26:46
10 30:57
11 34:41
